title: Palatino Linotype
content:
Family of four digital fonts, designed by [Hermann Zapf](http://web.archive.org/web/20120906061147/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hermann%20Zapf).

View [Palatino Linotype on the Linotype website](http://web.archive.org/web/20120906061147/http:/www.linotype.com/57056/palatinolinotype-family.html).

Please visit the [Palatino](http://web.archive.org/web/20120906061147/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Palatino) entry for more information.
author: dan_reynolds
